item.title: 6.7.1 Expense Type
item.description: Expense Type # To view Expense Type Management, do the following: Click on Manage > Expense > Expense type. Create new # To add a new Expense Type do the following: Step 1: Click Create Expense Type Step 2: A dialog box appears: Name: Enter the name of the Expense Type Group name: Enter the name of the group to create the expense type.
